name: Trail to Terranova
description:
Game made for the 2018 Train Jam with the theme Odyssey. Made with classics such as Oregon Trail and Space Invaders in mind, Trail to Terranova is a game about a colony trying to travel to a distant planet called Terranova.

Pro Tips:

In order to survive the journey be sure to stock up on rations and fuel.

In order to interact with the planets make sure to just run into them with your ship (as opposed to clicking on them).
